scripts.backend:start: cd ../../components/electric && make docker-build && cd ../../local-stack && source .envrc && ELECTRIC_IMAGE=electric:local-build && docker compose up -d
scripts.backend:migrate: docker exec -e PGPASSWORD=password local-stack-postgres_1-1 bash -c "printf '%s\n' 'CREATE TABLE items (value TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL);' \"CALL electric.electrify('items');\" | psql -h 127.0.0.1 -U postgres -d electric"
